name: Joe & Jim
description:
Joe and Jim is a student project made with Unity. It was made by 2 French boys from the Master PSM. 

It's an infinite runner for PC with accessibility options set in a cardboard universe.

Follow along Joe the skeleton and Jim the fly on their journey to find a treasure in space.

More than 200 sprites, 3 environnements to explore, 9 costumes to unlock and much more !
